assessment_item.subject: Microbiology
assessment_item.title: 7RG5YP-14-இருள் வினையினை எவ்வாறு அழைக்கப்படுகிறது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

இருள் வினையினை எவ்வாறு அழைக்கப்படுகிறது?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

கார்பன் – டை ஆக்ஸைடு நிலைப்படுத்துதல்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1996"},{"text":"

ஆக்ஸிஜன் நிலைப்படுத்துதல்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1997"},{"text":"

சல்பர் – டை ஆக்ஸைடு நிலைப்படுத்துதல்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2007"},{"text":"

நைட்ரஸ் ஆக்ஸைடு நிலைப்படுத்துதல்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2012"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7RG5YP-14-இருள் வினையினை எவ்வாறு அழைக்கப்படுகிறது?","title":"7RG5YP-14-இருள் வினையினை எவ்வாறு அழைக்கப்படுகிறது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","contentType":"Resource","mimeType":"application/vnd.ekstep.ecml-archive","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
